content: Enjoying a good meal is an essential part of enjoying life, hoho! I'll go gather the others and prepare a few more dishes for the gathering. Let us bring this day to a lovely close together.
info: 新生活烹饪台-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: There's a <style=Highlight>Cooking Counter</style> set up at Camp. Try gathering <style=Highlight>two</style> <style=Highlight>mushrooms</style> to make some Mushroom Soup, and bring it along for the dinner party.
info: 新生活烹饪台-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本II
新生活烹饪台-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: The Luca Sapling is growing splendidly! From what Loomi Co. has observed, new <style=Highlight>landforms</style> should be appearing on our planet very soon!
info: 新生活烹饪台-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: You've progressed faster than I thought. Hoho? I smell a new scent...
info: 新生活烹饪台-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: These freshly grown mushrooms smell great! They just reminded me of a dish: <style=Highlight>Mushroom Soup</style>. Here's the recipe...
info: 新生活烹饪台-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: You've had a full day. Have you eaten and had enough water? A thriving planet begins with a thriving you, and that starts with a good meal. How about we have a <style=Highlight>dinner party</style> together?
info: 新生活烹饪台-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本II
